title: McNeill 20th century env impacts table 9_3 MCQ 3

content.question: The changes in world carbon dioxide emissions and the world forested area reflect which of the following twentieth century historical contexts?

choices.label: The increase in economic liberalization and free-market economic policies
The increase in agricultural productivity and global population numbers
The emergence of debates about the nature of and causes of climate change
The emergence of global movements protesting social inequalities

content.answer: The emergence of debates about the nature of and causes of climate change

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
